title: Episode 23: Can Donald Trump Make Metro Great Again?
dc:creator: Martin Di Caro
description: The president-elect's promise to spend $1 trillion on infrastructure improvements is emerging as one of the least divisive aspects of his agenda, at least at this early stage. Will the Republican-controlled Congress go along with it? And would any of the money help WMATA?
